content: That's great! I think I'll check out some of those brands and styles. I've been thinking about getting a pair of sandals with a bit of a heel, something that can dress up or down. Do you think that's a good idea, or should I stick with flat sandals? And, by the way, I remember wearing my old Converse Chuck Taylor's to that music festival, and I was really surprised by how comfortable they were, even after hours of standing and dancing.
